What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play Phantom Nomad
2. attack or block with Phantom Nomad
3. cast Fog
4. although all combat damage is prevented by fog, Phantom Nomad still loses a +1/+1 counter What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.48.873 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
